techStack.title: Ecosystem Architecture
techStack.subtitle: Understanding the trust machinery: How data sovereignty works under the hood of your Node.

benefits.title: Real Sovereignty (P2P)
benefits.desc: Your data never goes to a centralized cloud. It travels directly from your server to the buyer's through an encrypted tunnel and only when the contract authorizes it.

benefits.title: Compute-to-Data
benefits.desc: For ultra-sensitive data, the data doesn't even move. The buyer's algorithm 'visits' your server, does the calculation and only takes the result. Absolute privacy.

benefits.title: Blockchain Audit
benefits.desc: Every access leaves an immutable trace on Pontus-X. This acts as an automatic 'Digital Notary', essential for justifying subsidies and security audits.

diagram.networkDesc: Only "Metadata" (The Menu) and Smart Contracts live here
diagram.neverCloud: ⚡ Data NEVER touches the central cloud

analogy.title: Change your mindset
analogy.description: A Node is not a centralized Dropbox. Imagine a high-security digital shopping mall where each store (Provider) never hands over their keys to the building owner, but customers can shop with complete confidence.

gaiax.title: Gaia-X: The Rules
gaiax.description: It's the constitution. It defines European standards for transparency, sovereignty and interoperability. Your Node complies with these rules "by design" to operate legally in the EU.

pontusx.title: Pontus-X: The Infrastructure
pontusx.description: It's the highway. A decentralized technical network (based on Web3 and Ocean Protocol technologies) that executes transactions securely and automatically.

blockchain.subtitle: The Notary
blockchain.title: Web3 / Blockchain
blockchain.description: Records who does what. No one can alter the history. Vital for justifying subsidies.

identity.subtitle: The Passport
identity.title: Sovereign Identity
identity.description: Each company has a Wallet. Guarantees that whoever enters is who they say they are.

connector.subtitle: The Gatekeeper
connector.title: The Connector
connector.description: Software installed at the customer's premises. Only opens the door if the contract rules are met.

elevator.title: How to explain it to your partners?
elevator.quote: "We're not uploading files to someone else's cloud. We're installing an intelligent digital customs in your own company. Your data doesn't leave until you authorize it and your payment and usage rules are met."
